items.text: iPhone-style grid layout for miniapps with colorful icons
Pastel color scheme with glass morphism effects and soft shadows
Welcome message is friendly and casual, using first name
User freely navigates between miniapps, no forced paths
Recently used miniapps could be highlighted or sorted to top
User is exploring available miniapps to find useful tools
Questions are clear and concise, not overwhelming
User can skip optional questions and proceed
Gathering user preferences for reading style and motivation
Light purple accent color (#C3B1E1) as the signature color for to-read miniapp
User can browse freely and select any book to read
Reading progress is saved automatically and visible on each book card
Clean, distraction-free reading interface with comfortable typography
User controls reading pace with chapter navigation
Reading position is bookmarked automatically so user can resume anytime
